document.full_text: a planned modernization of the u.s. national power grid will cost up to $476 billion over the next 20 years but will provide up to $2 trillion in customer benefits over that time, according to industry experts.
document.title: u.s. smart grid to cost billions, save trillions
lines_and_colors: a planned modernization of the u.s. national power grid will cost up to $476 billion over the next 20 years but will provide up to $2 trillion in customer benefits over that time, according to industry experts.
